title: edgycorner
author: edgycorner
content: Hey everyone,If you are a trader on localbitcoins, and want to automate your trades then I can help you out.I will be using official library of locabitcoins.I will make sure that your ad offers the best price in your region. Everything will be automated, except for:->Confirming that you have received the FIAT payment for any trade.->Sending FIAT payments from your bank account.I will create a whatsapp or telegram interface, so that you can do these two tasks seamlessly. Making them semi-automatic too Â As for the security of bot, localbitcoins offers you to set a pin. So no money will be released or withdrawn without that pin. Read about money_pin at https://localbitcoins.com/api-docs/
